RelatedSentence: U.S. drugstore chain Walgreen Co has been under pressure from some investors to do an inversion with European rival Alliance Boots Holdings Ltd , the Financial Times said .
Walgreen bought a 45 - percent stake in Alliance Boots in 2012 , with an option to buy the rest in 2015 .

While legal , inversions typically involve the acquisition by a U.S. company of a foreign company , then a restructuring allowing the U.S. company to be reflagged for tax purposes to the foreign company 's home or elsewhere .
